novel learning method.from sentence: In order to overcome the intrinsic limitation of existing 3 D face recovery models , we propose a novel learning method that leverages 2D " in - the - wild " face images to effectively supervise and facilitate the 3D face model learning .

novel self - supervised learning method.from sentence: We design a novel self - supervised learning method that is able to train a 3 D face model with weak supervision from 2D images .

2D landmarks.from sentence: The model should be able to recover 2D landmarks from predicted 3D ones via direct 3D - to - 2D projection .

our proposed method.from sentence: Additionally , our proposed method also exploits cycle - consistency over the 2D landmark predictions , i.e. , taking the recovered 2D landmarks as input , the model should be able to generate 2D landmarks ( by projecting its predicted 3D landmarks ) that have small difference with the annotated ones .

overall learning procedure.from sentence: To facilitate the overall learning procedure , our method also exploits self - critic learning .
